name: Snowdown (AlexBasta)
description:
Introduction

Snowdown is a split-screen projectile-based game, set in an alternate post-apocalyptic world. Whilst the situation above ground doesn't look too bad at first glance, the longer you look, the more you see how the nuclear winter has affected all that survived.

Snowdown is centered around the one versus one game mode, where both players throw snowballs at each other to be crowned the victor. The round-based gameplay encourages players to develop and hone their skills to become the superior Snowdown player.

 Snowball Types
  1. Snowball - The good ol' fashioned snowball, reliable and sturdy.
  2. Multiball - Who needs accuracy when you fire several snowballs at once?
  3. Fastball - If you have the need for speed, this snowball is for you, opponents will be hard pressed to be able dodge this speedy projectile
  4. Freezeball - Brr, getting hit by one of these will lock your controls briefly as your character recovers from their intense shivering.
Controls
  • Movement - Left Thumbstick
  • Look - Right Thumbstick
  • Aim - Left Trigger
  • Throw Snowball - Right Trigger
  • Jump - A
  • Dodge - B
  • Form Snowball – Right Bumper
